title: "R Notebook"
output: html_notebook

```{r}
library(RcppOctave)
.CallOctave("version")
```

```{r}
loader <- OctaveFunction("
function [DF] = readMatfile()
  clear
  load('leukemia.mat')
  DF = whos();
end")
```


```{r}
getwd()
```

```{r}
ld <- loader()
names(ld)
```

```{r}
ld$name
ld$size
ld$bytes
ld$class
```

```{r}
df <- data.frame(ld$name, ld$bytes, ld$class)
```
